project.name: CloudKid Sound API
project.description: CloudKid Sound API: A framework for Web Audio/Flash audio content built on top of CreateJS - SoundJS

Sound.name: Sound
Sound.description:
Acts as a wrapper for SoundJS as well as adding lots of other functionality
for managing sounds.

SoundInst.name: SoundInst
SoundInst.description:
A playing instance of a sound (or promise to play as soon as it loads). These can only
be created through cloudkid.Sound.instance.play().

SoundListTask.name: SoundListTask
SoundListTask.description:
A task for loading a list of sounds.. These can only
be created through Sound.instance.createPreloadTask().

SoundContext.name: SoundContext
SoundContext.description: A private class that represents a sound context.

params.name: id
params.description: The name of the sound context.

VOPlayer.name: VOPlayer
VOPlayer.description:
A class for managing audio by only playing one at a time, playing a list, and even
managing captions (CloudKidCaptions library) at the same time.

params.name: useCaptions
params.description:
If a cloudkid.Captions object should be created for use 
		or the captions object to use

classitems.description: A copy of _playAfterLoad bound to this Sound instance.
classitems.name: _playAfterLoadBound

classitems.description: Dictionary of sound objects, containing configuration info and playback objects.
classitems.name: _sounds

classitems.description:
*  Array of SoundInst objects that are being faded in or out.
	*  @property {Array} _fades
	*  @private
Array of SoundInst objects waiting to be used.
classitems.name: _pool

classitems.description: The extension of the supported sound type that will be used.
classitems.name: supportedSound

classitems.description: Dictionary of SoundContexts.
classitems.name: _contexts

classitems.description:
A constant for telling Sound not to handle a sound with play(), but to
return what SoundJS returns directly.
classitems.name: UNHANDLED

classitems.description:
Initializes the Sound singleton. If using createjs.FlashPlugin, you will be responsible for setting
createjs.FlashPlugin.BASE_PATH.
classitems.name: init

params.name: pluginOrder
params.description: The SoundJS plugins to pass to createjs.Sound.registerPlugins().

params.name: filetypeOrder
params.description:
The order in which file types are preferred, where "ogg" becomes a ".ogg"
				extension on all sound file urls.

params.name: completeCallback
params.description: A function to call when initialization is complete.

classitems.description: The singleton instance of Sound.
classitems.name: instance

classitems.description: Loads a config object. This should not be called until after Sound.init() is complete.
classitems.name: loadConfig

params.name: config
params.description: The config to load.

params.name: defaultContext
params.description:
The optional sound context to load sounds into unless 
	otherwise specified. Sounds do not require a context.

classitems.description: If a sound exists in the list of recognized sounds.
classitems.name: exists

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias of the sound to look for.

return.description: true if the sound exists, false otherwise.

classitems.description: If a sound is unloaded.
classitems.name: isUnloaded

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias of the sound to look for.

return.description: true if the sound is unloaded, false if it is loaded, loading or does not exist.

classitems.description: If a sound is loaded.
classitems.name: isLoaded

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias of the sound to look for.

return.description: true if the sound is loaded, false if it is not loaded or does not exist.

classitems.description: If a sound is in the process of being loaded
classitems.name: isLoading

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias of the sound to look for.

return.description: true if the sound is currently loading, false if it is loaded, unloaded, or does not exist.

classitems.description: If a sound is playing.
classitems.name: isPlaying

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias of the sound to look for.

return.description: true if the sound is currently playing or loading with an intent to play, false if it is not playing or does not exist.

classitems.description: Fades a sound from 0 to a specified volume.
classitems.name: fadeIn

params.name: aliasOrInst
params.description: The alias of the sound to fade the last played instance of, or an instance returned from play().

params.name: duration
params.description: The duration in milliseconds to fade for. The default is 500ms.

params.name: targetVol
params.description: The volume to fade to. The default is the sound's default volume.

params.name: startVol
params.description: The volume to start from. The default is 0.

classitems.description:
Fades a sound from the current volume to a specified volume. A sound that ends at 0 volume
is stopped after the fade.
classitems.name: fadeOut

params.name: aliasOrInst
params.description: The alias of the sound to fade the last played instance of, or an instance returned from play().

params.name: duration
params.description: The duration in milliseconds to fade for. The default is 500ms.

params.name: targetVol
params.description: The volume to fade to. The default is 0.

params.name: startVol
params.description: The volume to fade from. The default is the current volume.

classitems.description: The update call, used for fading sounds. This is bound to the instance of Sound
classitems.name: _update

params.name: elapsed
params.description: The time elapsed since the previous frame, in milliseconds.

classitems.description: Plays a sound.
classitems.name: play

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias of the sound to play.

params.name: completeCallback
params.description:
An optional function to call when the sound is finished. 
		Passing cloudkid.Sound.UNHANDLED results in cloudkid.Sound not handling the sound 
		and merely returning what SoundJS returns from its play() call.

params.name: startCallback
params.description:
An optional function to call when the sound starts playback.
		If the sound is loaded, this is called immediately, if not, it calls when the 
		sound is finished loading.

params.name: interrupt
params.description: If the sound should interrupt previous sounds (SoundJS parameter). Default is false.

params.name: delay
params.description: The delay to play the sound at in milliseconds(SoundJS parameter). Default is 0.

params.name: offset
params.description: The offset into the sound to play in milliseconds(SoundJS parameter). Default is 0.

params.name: loop
params.description:
How many times the sound should loop. Use -1 (or true) for infinite loops (SoundJS parameter).
		Default is no looping.

params.name: volume
params.description: The volume to play the sound at (0 to 1). Omit to use the default for the sound.

params.name: pan
params.description: The panning to start the sound at (-1 to 1). Default is centered (0).

return.description:
An internal SoundInst object that can be used for fading in/out as well as 
		pausing and getting the sound's current position.

classitems.description: Gets a SoundInst, from the pool if available or maks a new one if not.
classitems.name: _getSoundInst

params.name: channel
params.description: A createjs SoundInstance to initialize the object with.

params.name: id
params.description: The alias of the sound that is going to be used.

return.description: The SoundInst that is ready to use.

classitems.description: Plays a sound after it finishes loading.
classitems.name: _playAfterload

params.name: alias
params.description: The sound to play.

classitems.description: The callback used for when a sound instance is complete.
classitems.name: _onSoundComplete

params.name: inst
params.description: The SoundInst that is complete.s

classitems.description: Stops all playing or loading instances of a given sound.
classitems.name: stop

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias of the sound to stop.

classitems.description: Stops all playing SoundInsts for a sound.
classitems.name: _stopSound

params.name: s
params.description: The sound (from the _sounds dictionary) to stop.

classitems.description: Stops and repools a specific SoundInst.
classitems.name: _stopInst

params.name: inst
params.description: The SoundInst to stop.

classitems.description: Stops all sounds in a given context.
classitems.name: stopContext

params.name: context
params.description: The name of the context to stop.

classitems.description: Pauses a specific sound.
classitems.name: pauseSound

params.name: alias
params.description:
The alias of the sound to pause. 
	Internally, this can also be the object from the _sounds dictionary directly.

classitems.description: Unpauses a specific sound.
classitems.name: unpauseSound

params.name: alias
params.description:
The alias of the sound to pause. 
	Internally, this can also be the object from the _sounds dictionary directly.

classitems.description: Pauses all sounds.
classitems.name: pauseAll

classitems.description: Unpauses all sounds.
classitems.name: unpauseAll

classitems.description: Sets mute status of all sounds in a context
classitems.name: setContextMute

params.name: context
params.description: The name of the context to modify.

params.name: muted
params.description: If the context should be muted.

classitems.description: Sets volume of a context. Individual sound volumes are multiplied by this value.
classitems.name: setContextVolume

params.name: context
params.description: The name of the context to modify.

params.name: volume
params.description: The volume for the context (0 to 1).

classitems.description: Preloads a specific sound.
classitems.name: preloadSound

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias of the sound to load.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when the sound is finished loading.

classitems.description: Preloads a list of sounds.
classitems.name: preload

params.name: list
params.description: An array of sound aliases to load.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when all sounds have been loaded.

classitems.description: Marks a sound as loaded. If it needs to play after the load, then it is played.
classitems.name: _markLoaded

params.name: alias
params.description: The alias of the sound to mark.

params.name: callback
params.description: A function to call to show that the sound is loaded.

classitems.description: Creates a Task for the CloudKid Task library for preloading a list of sounds.
classitems.name: createPreloadTask

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the task.

params.name: list
params.description: An array of sound aliases to load.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when the task is complete.

return.description: A task to load up all of the sounds in the list.

classitems.description:
Unloads a list of sounds to reclaim memory if possible. 
If the sounds are playing, they are stopped.
classitems.name: unload

params.name: list
params.description: An array of sound aliases to unload.

classitems.description: Places a SoundInst back in the pool for reuse.
classitems.name: _poolinst

params.name: inst
params.description: The instance to repool.

classitems.description: Destroys cloudkid.Sound. This does not unload loaded sounds, destroy SoundJS to do that.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: SoundJS SoundInstance, essentially a sound channel.
classitems.name: _channel

classitems.description: Internal callback function for when the sound ends.
classitems.name: _endFunc

classitems.description: User's callback function for when the sound ends.
classitems.name: _endCallback

classitems.description: User's callback function for when the sound starts. This is only used if the sound wasn't loaded before play() was called.
classitems.name: _startFunc

classitems.description: An array of relevant parameters passed to play(). This is only used if the sound wasn't loaded before play() was called.
classitems.name: _startParams

classitems.description: The alias for the sound that this instance was created from.
classitems.name: alias

classitems.description: The current time in milliseconds for the fade that this sound instance is performing.
classitems.name: _fTime

classitems.description: The duration in milliseconds for the fade that this sound instance is performing.
classitems.name: _fDur

classitems.description: The starting volume for the fade that this sound instance is performing.
classitems.name: _fEnd

classitems.description: The ending volume for the fade that this sound instance is performing.
classitems.name: _fEnd

classitems.description:
The current sound volume (0 to 1). This is multiplied by the sound context's volume.
Setting this won't take effect until updateVolume() is called.
classitems.name: curVol

classitems.description: The length of the sound in milliseconds. This is 0 if it hasn't finished loading.
classitems.name: length

classitems.description: If the sound is currently paused. Setting this has no effect - use pause() and unpause().
classitems.name: paused

classitems.description: An active SoundInst should always be valid. This is primarily for compatability with cloudkid.Audio.
classitems.name: isValid

classitems.description: The position of the sound playhead in milliseconds, or 0 if it hasn't started playing yet.
classitems.name: position

classitems.description: Stops this SoundInst.
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: Updates the volume of this SoundInst.
classitems.name: updateVolume

params.name: contextVol
params.description: The volume of the sound context that the sound belongs to. If omitted, the volume is automatically collected.

classitems.description: Pauses this SoundInst.
classitems.name: pause

classitems.description: Unpauses this SoundInst.
classitems.name: unpause

classitems.description: The name of the sound context.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: The current volume to apply to all sounds in the context (0 to 1).
classitems.name: volume

classitems.description: If all sounds in the sound context are muted or not.
classitems.name: muted

classitems.description: The sound objects in this context, from Sound.instance._sounds;
classitems.name: sounds

classitems.description: If the VOPlayer should keep a list of all audio it plays for unloading later. Default is false.
classitems.name: trackAudio

classitems.description: The current list of audio/silence times/functions. Generally you will not need to modify this.
classitems.name: audioList

classitems.description: The current position in audioList.
classitems.name: _listCounter

classitems.description: The current audio alias being played.
classitems.name: _currentAudio

classitems.description: The current audio instance being played.
classitems.name: _audioInst

classitems.description: The callback for when the list is finished.
classitems.name: _callback

classitems.description: The callback for when the list is interrupted for any reason.
classitems.name: _cancelledCallback

classitems.description: The bound _onAudioFinished call.
classitems.name: _audioListener

classitems.description: A list of audio file played by this, so that they can be unloaded later.
classitems.name: _playedAudio

classitems.description: A timer for silence entries in the list, in milliseconds.
classitems.name: _timer

classitems.description:
The cloudkid.Captions object used for captions. The developer is responsible for initializing this with a captions
dictionary config file and a reference to a text field.
classitems.name: captions

classitems.description: An Array used when play() is called to avoid creating lots of Array objects.
classitems.name: _listHelper

classitems.description: If VOPlayer is currently playing (audio or silence).
classitems.name: playing

classitems.description: Plays a single audio alias, interrupting any current playback.
classitems.name: play

params.name: id
params.description: The alias of the audio file to play.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when playback is complete.

params.name: cancelledCallback
params.description: The function to call when playback is interrupted with a stop(), play() or playList() call.

classitems.description:
Plays a list of audio files, timers, and/or functions, interrupting any current playback.
Audio in the list will be preloaded to minimize pauses for loading.
classitems.name: playList

params.name: list
params.description: The array of items to play/call in order.

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when playback is complete.

params.name: cancelledCallback
params.description: The function to call when playback is interrupted with a stop(), play() or playList() call.

classitems.description: Callback for when audio/timer is finished to advance to the next item in the list.
classitems.name: _onAudioFinished

classitems.description:
The update callback used for silence timers and updating captions without active audio.
This method is bound to the VOPlayer instance.
classitems.name: _update

params.name: elapsed
params.description: The time elapsed since the previous frame, in milliseconds.

classitems.description:
The update callback used for updating captions with active audio.
This method is bound to the VOPlayer instance.
classitems.name: _updateCaptionPos

params.name: elapsed
params.description: The time elapsed since the previous frame, in milliseconds.

classitems.description: Plays the current audio item and begins preloading the next item.
classitems.name: _playAudio

classitems.description: Stops playback of any audio/timer.
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: Unloads all audio this VOPlayer has played. If trackAudio is false, this won't do anything.
classitems.name: unloadPlayedAudio

classitems.description: Cleans up this VOPlayer.
classitems.name: destroy

warnings.message:
Missing item type
*  Array of SoundInst objects that are being faded in or out.
	*  @property {Array} _fades
	*  @private
